txt.en: Zôreth can be found in the dungeons of Barad-dûr.\n\nYou have performed all of your duties and should now report to Zôreth.

'Are you the dwarf Núluzagar promised me?'

You nod. Zôreth looks you over, and a smirk forms at the corner of her mouth.

'Yes, you will do.'
Labour in the dungeons of Barad-dûr ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
In the dungeons of Barad-dûr, the Stout-axes are made to toil without end for the Dark Lord of Mordor.
You have been ordered to labour in the dungeons of Barad-dûr.

'Dwarf!'

'Why do you stand idle when you know what is demanded of you? Are you content to let the rest of your malformed kind bear these burdens for you? If that is so, the Dark Lord has little use for you. You are not useless, are you?'

You shake your head.

'I thought not.

'When your labours are finished, you are to present yourself to Zôreth.

'Do as you are bidden.'
